name: Fireflower Eagle Eye
description: What's a celebration without some fireworks.

heroPerk.name: Parting Gift
heroPerk.description: <HeroAbility>Phase Shift</> leaves behind fireworks which deal <Number>7</> base <ModifiedAttribute>Damage</> every .5 second.

commanderPerk.name: Parting Gift +
commanderPerk.description: <HeroAbility>Phase Shift</> leaves behind fireworks which deal <Number>24</> base <ModifiedAttribute>Damage</> every .5 seconds.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Quickly dash through space, gaining [Ability.Line2]% increased movement speed for [Ability.Line3] seconds.

abilities.name: Shock Tower
abilities.description: Deploy a device which shocks nearby enemies, stunning them and dealing [Damage] base damage.

abilities.name: Seismic Smash
abilities.description: Smash the ground, creating a fissure of energy which deals [Damage.Value] energy damage to enemies.

recruitment.sourceText: Found inside Lunar Llamas in the Llama Shop.
